metadata.title: CVE-2023-52780 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:mvneta: fix calls to page_pool_get_stats Calling page_pool_get_stats in themvneta driver without checks leads to kernel crashes. First the page poolis only available if the bm is not used. The page pool is also notallocated when the port is stopped. It can also be not allocated in case oferrors. The current implementation leads to the following crash callingethstats on a port that is down or when calling it at the wrong moment: bleto handle kernel NULL pointer dereference at virtual address
